Class FormatUtils

extends java.lang.Object

      • cleanupDirtyValueString

        public static java.lang.String cleanupDirtyValueString(java.lang.String dirtyValue)
        Removes any non decimal characters from a string that represents a value. If the string contains no numbers after the cleaning, returns 0;
        Parameters:
        dirtyValue - A contaminated string with decimals and other characters
        Returns:
        A decimal-only string from the input
